abstract.t: YANG lacks re-usability of models defined outside of the grouping and augmentation mechanisms. For instance, it is almost impossible to reuse a model defined for a device in the context of the network, i.e by encapsulating it in a list indexed by device IDs. [RFC8528] defines the YANG mount mechanism, partially solving the problem by allowing to include schemas at deploy or runtime. This document aims to provide the same mechanism at design time.
